Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.parser.DependencyArc

  • Packages that use DependencyArc 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser), evaluation ( ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.parser that return DependencyArc 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DependencyArc ParseConfiguration.addDependency(PosTaggedToken head, PosTaggedToken dependent, java.lang.String label, Transition transition)
      Add the given dependency to the current configuration.
      DependencyArc ParseConfiguration.addManualNonProjectiveDependency(PosTaggedToken head, PosTaggedToken dependent, java.lang.String label)
      Add the given dependency to the current configuration's non-projective dependency set.
      DependencyArc ParseConfiguration.getGoverningDependency(PosTaggedToken dependent)
      Get the dependency arc governing a given pos-tagged token in the current set of dependencies.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.parser that return types with arguments of type DependencyArc 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<DependencyArc> ParseConfiguration.getDependencies()
      A set of dependency arcs defined by the current configuration.
      java.util.Set<DependencyArc> ParseConfiguration.getNonProjectiveDependencies()
      A set of potentially non-projective dependency arcs defined by the current configuration, typically because they were read from a manually annotated corpus.
      java.util.Set<DependencyArc> ParseConfiguration.getRealDependencies()
      Get dependencies which are not unlabeled dependencies pointing at the root.

      Method parameters in com.joliciel.talismane.parser with type arguments of type DependencyArc 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void TransitionSystem.predictTransitions(ParseConfiguration configuration, java.util.Set<DependencyArc> targetDependencies)
      Predict the transitions required to generate the set of targe dependencies for a given initial configuration, also transforms the configuration so that it becomes a terminal configuration.
